text: “Gumazitam gumazir igharazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham, ia a isɨ kotiam datɨghɨva akam a gasɨ, gumazir pumuning o gumazir 3plan an ganiziba, me bar kotɨn aven akar otevir vamɨra damuam, kamaghɨn ia deraghvɨra fogh suam, gumazir kam guizbangɨra arazir kam gami, eghtɨ bizir kam bangɨn gumazir kam aremegham. Gumazir vamɨra a uabɨra, an mɨgɨrɨgɨam kotɨn aven gavgaviba puvatɨgham. Eghtɨ ia gumazir kam mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan kogham.
